title: paraashakti manuparaadaa
sahitya:
parAshakti manuparAdA nApai parAkElanamma



anupallavi



purANi dharmasamvardani shrIpurAdhIshvari rAjashEkhari



caraNam 1

vArAhi dhara dEvarAja jAlajabhava rakSasAdulu varAlu kOru

vAraNanE nAgavarAtmajE munivarAcitE nanu brOvarAdA O



caraNam 2 



 vishAla nayanE kushalugaA nIdu sEva jEsi dashAdhipAdulu

shAsvatulai paravashAla natisEya shAntamuna jUcu shAmbhavi O



caraNam 3 



niraparAdhula nirAkArincE durAtmakula nindurAka sEyaga

rAdA vara tyAgarAjanuta shubada rAma sOdari dharAdharasutE
